Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a tiebreaking single in a four-run eighth inning.
D. Lynch IV pitched 3.0 innings with 1 hit, 0 earned runs, 4 strikeouts, and 0 walks.
L. Erceg earned a save with 1.0 inning pitched, 0 hits, 0 earned runs, 1 strikeout, and 0 walks.
J. Duran took the loss with 0.1 innings pitched, 2 hits, 3 earned runs, 1 strikeout, and 0 walks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kansas City Royals beat the Minnesota Twins 4-2 to open a 1 1/2-game lead for the second AL wild card.
The game was held at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri, with an attendance of 29,160.
The game lasted 2 hours and 14 minutes.
